00049 inline bool isSameMorphemeList( const MorphemeList* list1, const MorphemeList* list2, bool printPOS )
00050 {
00051         // if one is zero pointer, return null
00052         if( !list1 || !list2 )
00053         {
00054                 return false;
00055         }
00056 
00057         if( list1->size() != list2->size() )
00058                 return false;
00059         //compare one by one
00060         size_t N = list1->size();
00061         if( printPOS )
00062         {
00063                 for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00064                 {
00065                         const Morpheme& m1 = (*list1)[i];
00066                         const Morpheme& m2 = (*list2)[i];
00067                         if( m1.lexicon_ != m2.lexicon_ || m1.posCode_ != m2.posCode_
00068                                         || m1.posStr_ != m2.posStr_ )
00069                         {
00070                                 return false;
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073         }
00074         else
00075         {
00076                 for( size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i )
00077                 {
00078                         if( (*list1)[i].lexicon_ != (*list2)[i].lexicon_ )
00079                                 return false;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         //all the elements are the same
00083         return true;
00084 }

00117 POSTable::POSFormat JMA_Analyzer::getPOSFormat() const
00118 {
00119     POSTable::POSFormat type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_DEFAULT;
00120 
00121     if(getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET) != 0)
00122     {
00123         type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET;
00124     }
00125     else if(getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FULL_CATEGORY) != 0)
00126     {
00127         type = POSTable::POS_FORMAT_FULL_CATEGORY;
00128     }
00129 
00130     return type;
00131 }

00133 void JMA_Analyzer::setKnowledge(Knowledge* pKnowledge)
00134 {
00135     assert(pKnowledge);
00136 
00137     // release the resources before allocating new ones
00138     clear();
00139 
00140     knowledge_ = dynamic_cast<JMA_Knowledge*>(pKnowledge);
00141     assert(knowledge_);
00142 
00143     tagger_ = knowledge_->createTagger();
00144     // if runWith*() would be called, tagger_ should not be NULL,
00145     // if only splitSentence() would be called, tagger_ could be NULL as no dictionary needs to be loaded.
00146     if(tagger_)
00147     {
00148         tagger_->set_lattice_level(1);
00149     }
00150 
00151     posTable_ = knowledge_->getPOSTable();
00152     kanaTable_ = knowledge_->getKanaTable();
00153 }
00154 
00155 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithSentence(Sentence& sentence)
00156 {
00157     if(tagger_ == 0)
00158     {
00159         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00160         return 0;
00161     }
00162 
00163         bool printPOS = isOutputPOS();
00164         int N = (int)getOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST);
00165     const int maxCount = N * NBEST_LIMIT_SCALE_FACTOR;
00166 
00167         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(sentence.getString(), ' ');
00168         const char* strPtr =  retStr.c_str();
00169 
00170         //one best
00171         if(N <= 1)
00172         {
00173                 const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00174                 MorphemeList list;
00175         Morpheme morp;
00176                 for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next;)
00177                 {
00178             node = combineNode(node, morp);
00179                         if(knowledge_->isStopWord(morp.lexicon_))
00180                                 continue;
00181                         list.push_back(morp);
00182                 }
00183                 sentence.addList(list, 1.0);
00184         }
00185         // N-best
00186         else
00187         {
00188                 double totalScore = 0;
00189 
00190                 if( !tagger_->parseNBestInit( strPtr ) )
00191                 {
00192                         cerr << "[Error] Cannot parseNBestInit on the " << strPtr << endl;
00193                         return 0;
00194                 }
00195 
00196                 long base = 0;
00197                 int i = 0;
00198                 for (int j=0; i<N && j<maxCount; ++j)
00199                 {
00200                         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->nextNode();
00201                         if( !bosNode )
00202                                 break;
00203                         MorphemeList list;
00204             Morpheme morp;
00205                         for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next;)
00206                         {
00207                 node = combineNode(node, morp);
00208                 if(knowledge_->isStopWord(morp.lexicon_))
00209                     continue;
00210                                 list.push_back(morp);
00211                         }
00212 
00213                         bool isDupl = false;
00214                         //check the current result with exits results
00215                         for( int listOffset = sentence.getListSize() - 1 ; listOffset >= 0; --listOffset )
00216                         {
00217                                 if( isSameMorphemeList( sentence.getMorphemeList(listOffset), &list, printPOS ) )
00218                                 {
00219                                         isDupl = true;
00220                                         break;
00221                                 }
00222                         }
00223                         //ignore the duplicate results
00224                         if( isDupl )
00225                                 continue;
00226 
00227                         long score = tagger_->nextScore();
00228                         if( i == 0 )
00229                         {
00230                                 if(score > 0 )
00231                                         base = score > BASE_NBEST_SCORE ? score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE : 0;
00232                                 else
00233                                         base = score - BASE_NBEST_SCORE;
00234                         }
00235 
00236                         double dScore = 1.0 / (score - base );
00237                         totalScore += dScore;
00238                         sentence.addList( list, dScore );
00239 
00240                         ++i;
00241                 }
00242 
00243                 for ( int j = 0; j < i; ++j )
00244                 {
00245                         sentence.setScore(j, sentence.getScore(j) / totalScore );
00246                 }
00247         }
00248 
00249         return 1;
00250 }

00252 const char* JMA_Analyzer::runWithString(const char* inStr)
00253 {
00254     if(tagger_ == 0)
00255     {
00256         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00257         return 0;
00258     }
00259 
00260         bool printPOS = isOutputPOS();
00261 
00262         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(inStr, ' ');
00263         const char* strPtr =  retStr.c_str();
00264 
00265         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00266 
00267         strBuf_.clear();
00268     Morpheme morp;
00269     for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next;){
00270         node = combineNode(node, morp);
00271         if(knowledge_->isStopWord(morp.lexicon_))
00272             continue;
00273 
00274         strBuf_ += morp.lexicon_;
00275         if(printPOS) {
00276             strBuf_ += posDelimiter_;
00277             strBuf_ += morp.posStr_;
00278         }
00279         strBuf_ += wordDelimiter_;
00280     }
00281 
00282         return strBuf_.c_str();
00283 }

00285 int JMA_Analyzer::runWithStream(const char* inFileName, const char* outFileName)
00286 {
00287         assert(inFileName);
00288         assert(outFileName);
00289 
00290     if(tagger_ == 0)
00291     {
00292         cerr << "MeCab::Tagger is not created, please insure that dictionary files are loaded successfully." << endl;
00293         return 0;
00294     }
00295 
00296         bool printPOS = isOutputPOS();
00297 
00298         ifstream in(inFileName);
00299         if(!in)
00300         {
00301                 cerr<<"[Error] The input file "<<inFileName<<" not exists!"<<endl;
00302                 return 0;
00303         }
00304 
00305     ofstream out(outFileName);
00306         if(!out)
00307         {
00308                 cerr<<"[Error] The output file "<<outFileName<<" could not be created!"<<endl;
00309                 return 0;
00310         }
00311 
00312     string line;
00313     Morpheme morp;
00314     while (getline(in, line)) {
00315         string retStr = knowledge_->getCType()->replaceSpaces(line.c_str(), ' ');
00316         const char* strPtr =  retStr.c_str();
00317 
00318         const MeCab::Node* bosNode = tagger_->parseToNode( strPtr );
00319 
00320         for (const MeCab::Node *node = bosNode->next; node->next;){
00321             node = combineNode(node, morp);
00322             if(knowledge_->isStopWord(morp.lexicon_))
00323                 continue;
00324 
00325             out << morp.lexicon_;
00326             if(printPOS)
00327                 out << posDelimiter_ << morp.posStr_;
00328             out << wordDelimiter_;
00329         }
00330 
00331         out << endl;
00332     }
00333 
00334     in.close();
00335     out.close();
00336     return 1;
00337 }
00338 
00339 void JMA_Analyzer::splitSentence(const char* paragraph, std::vector<Sentence>& sentences)
00340 {
00341     if(! paragraph)
00342         return;
00343 
00344     Sentence result;
00345     string sentenceStr;
00346     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer( knowledge_->getCType() );
00347     tokenizer.assign(paragraph);
00348     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00349     {
00350         if( knowledge_->isSentenceSeparator(p) )
00351         {
00352             sentenceStr += p;
00353 
00354             result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00355             sentences.push_back(result);
00356 
00357             sentenceStr.clear();
00358         }
00359         /*// white-space characters are also used as sentence separator,
00360         // but they are ignored in the sentence result
00361         else if(ctype_->isSpace(p))
00362         {
00363             if(! sentenceStr.empty())
00364             {
00365                 result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00366                 sentences.push_back(result);
00367 
00368                 sentenceStr.clear();
00369             }
00370         }*/
00371         else
00372         {
00373             sentenceStr += p;
00374         }
00375     }
00376 
00377     // in case the last character is not space or sentence separator
00378     if(! sentenceStr.empty())
00379     {
00380         result.setString(sentenceStr.c_str());
00381         sentences.push_back(result);
00382 
00383         sentenceStr.clear();
00384     }
00385 }

00387 void JMA_Analyzer::getFeatureStr(const char* featureList, int featureOffset, string& retVal) const
00388 {
00389     assert(featureList && featureOffset >= 0);
00390 
00391         int offset = 0;
00392         int commaCount = 0;
00393         int begin = -1;
00394         int end = -1;
00395         for( ; featureList[offset]; ++offset )
00396         {
00397                 if(featureList[offset] == ',')
00398                 {
00399                         ++commaCount;
00400                         if(commaCount == featureOffset)
00401                                 begin = offset + 1;
00402                         else if(commaCount == featureOffset + 1)
00403                         {
00404                                 end = offset;
00405                                 break;
00406                         }
00407                 }
00408         }
00409 
00410         if(begin >= 0)
00411         {
00412                 if(end < 0)
00413                         end = offset;
00414                 retVal = string(featureList + begin, end - begin);
00415         }
00416 
00417         if(retVal == "*")
00418                 retVal = "";
00419 }
00420 
00421 Morpheme JMA_Analyzer::getMorpheme(const MeCab::Node* node) const
00422 {
00423     assert(node);
00424 
00425     Morpheme result;
00426 
00427     result.lexicon_.assign(node->surface, node->length);
00428 
00429     getFeatureStr(node->feature, knowledge_->getBaseFormOffset(), result.baseForm_);
00430     if(result.baseForm_.empty())
00431         result.baseForm_ = result.lexicon_;
00432 
00433     getFeatureStr(node->feature, knowledge_->getReadFormOffset(), result.readForm_);
00434 
00435     result.posCode_ = (int)node->posid;
00436     result.posStr_ = posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, getPOSFormat());
00437 
00438     // convert lexicon to Hiragana or Katakana
00439     if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_HIRAGANA) != 0)
00440         result.lexicon_ = convertToHiragana(result.lexicon_.c_str());
00441     else if(getOption(OPTION_TYPE_CONVERT_TO_KATAKANA) != 0)
00442         result.lexicon_ = convertToKatakana(result.lexicon_.c_str());
00443 
00444     return result;
00445 }
00446 
00447 MeCab::Node* JMA_Analyzer::combineNode(const MeCab::Node* startNode, Morpheme& result) const
00448 {
00449     assert(startNode && "it is invalid to combine NULL node");
00450 
00451     MeCab::Node* nextNode = startNode->next;
00452     assert(nextNode && "it is invalid to combine EOS node.");
00453 
00454     result = getMorpheme(startNode);
00455 
00456     // check option
00457     if(! isCombineNounAffix())
00458     {
00459         return nextNode;
00460     }
00461 
00462     for(; nextNode->next; nextNode=nextNode->next)
00463     {
00464         int combineID = posTable_->combinePOS(result.posCode_, (int)nextNode->posid);
00465         if(combineID == -1)
00466         {
00467 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_SEPARATE
00468             if(!strcmp(posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET), "P-N")
00469                     && !strcmp(posTable_->getPOS((int)nextNode->posid, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET), "NP-C"))
00470                     //if(!strcmp(posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET), "P-N"))
00471             //if(!strcmp(posTable_->getPOS((int)nextNode->posid, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET), "NS-D"))
00472             {
00473                 Morpheme nextMorph = getMorpheme(nextNode);
00474 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_SEPARATE
00475                 cerr << result.lexicon_ << "/" << result.posStr_ << "/" << posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET);
00476                 cerr << "\t\t" << nextMorph.lexicon_ << "/" << nextMorph.posStr_ << "/" << posTable_->getPOS(nextMorph.posCode_, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET);
00477                 cerr << endl;
00478 #endif
00479             }
00480 #endif
00481             break;
00482         }
00483 
00484         Morpheme nextMorph = getMorpheme(nextNode);
00485 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00486         cerr << result.lexicon_ << "/" << result.posStr_;
00487         cerr << "\t+\t" << nextMorph.lexicon_ << "/" << nextMorph.posStr_;
00488 #endif
00489         result.lexicon_ += nextMorph.lexicon_;
00490         result.baseForm_ += nextMorph.baseForm_;
00491         result.readForm_ += nextMorph.readForm_;
00492         result.posCode_ = combineID;
00493         result.posStr_ = posTable_->getPOS(result.posCode_, getPOSFormat());
00494 #if JMA_DEBUG_PRINT_COMBINE
00495         cerr << "\t=>\t" << result.lexicon_ << "/" << result.posStr_ << endl;
00496 #endif
00497     }
00498 
00499     return nextNode;
00500 }
00501 
00502 std::string JMA_Analyzer::convertToHiragana(const char* str) const
00503 {
00504     assert(str);
00505 
00506     string result;
00507     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00508     tokenizer.assign(str);
00509 
00510     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00511     {
00512         const char* q = kanaTable_->toHiragana(p);
00513         if(q)
00514             result += q;
00515         else
00516             result += p;
00517     }
00518 
00519     return result;
00520 }
00521 
00522 std::string JMA_Analyzer::convertToKatakana(const char* str) const
00523 {
00524     assert(str);
00525 
00526     string result;
00527     CTypeTokenizer tokenizer(knowledge_->getCType());
00528     tokenizer.assign(str);
00529 
00530     for(const char* p=tokenizer.next(); p; p=tokenizer.next())
00531     {
00532         const char* q = kanaTable_->toKatakana(p);
00533         if(q)
00534             result += q;
00535         else
00536             result += p;
00537     }
00538 
00539     return result;
00540 }
